website_summaries.verdict: This age old cure-all packs a mighty anti-inflammatory punch that's great for muscle aches and joint pain. Therapeutic grade.
pros: Frankincense is proven to have analgesic, anti arthritic, and anti-inflammatory properties that work well to relieve muscle, joint, and nerve pain
This certified organic formula is safe for ingestion
Therapeutic grade, pure oil extracted using steam distillation
cons: Packaging may be problematic - a handful of bottles arrived leaking or damaged

customer_reviews.title: Frankincense Remedy
customer_reviews.text: I have a rather rare form of Breast Cancer and am treating it with Frankincense Oil as my only remedy. I Love this oil as it can be taken internally, which I do by mixing 3 or more drops in 8 ozs of water everyday, and also use as a rub on my breasts. My body seems to be very happy with this Frankincense Oil and responding favorably.
customer_reviews.author: Leelabai

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: To me, this Frankinsence Boswellia Serrata has a better scent than the Frankinsence Serrata (different brand) that I have tried before. As a stage 4 cancer survivor, I love that it can be safely ingested! After just a few applications on a couple of age spots, they seem to be reducing in size and are no longer itchy. The price is great for a whole ounce. Since I use this product daily, I plan to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Darcie MacKin

customer_reviews.title: Internal and External use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Good for internal use......if you can handle the smell, it has many healing properties. This is the best one for tea, so don't waste your time looking for another, this is it. Internal and external. It's USDA certified organic bottled in Georgia....it's a southern thing....lol
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great for overall wellbeing
customer_reviews.text: Using it for overall wellbeing. Just don't ever take it straight, I took several drops under my tongue by mistake (meant to take one only) and it caused a lot of gastric discomfort, a lot! Mixed with water and sipped throughout the day, is easier to take. I know someone who took it for wellbeing and a pain in his throat that was there for years has slowly cleared up in about 2 months so far. Always check with your doctor before taking any supplementation of course.
customer_reviews.author: Marly

customer_reviews.title: Certified organic Frankincense Essential oil
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed.It was easy to open the lid. IT didn't make that sound pop. Plus no outside plastic seal.And it smell chemicals..I took few drops with water and my stomach act funny...I will see...But it smell strong chemical like and it seems diluted too.Not strong enough.Amazon is funny and weird lately..I shopped in years thousands of dollars and it used to be better...Let me say again that it is what you claim to be.Maybe is not the seller is the people who packed it...I don't know...Maybe you need to send me another one(that is what it says it is) free for all the trouble I go...Blessings!
customer_reviews.author: francesca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.💯
customer_reviews.text: He arrived in perfect condition. I use it for my 86-year-old mother who has Alzhaimer. I have noticed great changes in your daily routine. Dose that I give to eat 5 drops daily. Since she is consuming the essential oil, changes that I have been able to notice, better mood, colobora in everything that is asked of her, she is again eating her different meals alone, she asks some questions. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Clemen Silverio

customer_reviews.title: Zongle USDA Certified Organic Frankincense
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better Frankincense products I have purchased. I have no way of knowing at this time if it is actually helping me with my immune system and fighting stage 4 cancer. I will keep purchasing Zongle USDA Certified Organic Frankincense as long as I can afford to.
customer_reviews.author: BobCalvert

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I was initially skeptical about the quality of this product because a well known competitor's price is three times as much for half the dosage! I was also concerned because I reviewed several complaints about the shipment arriving in poor condition with leaking bottles. I was pleasantly surprised to discover the Frankincense Oil didn't leave a medicinal after taste as I had expected and is quite easy to ingest when the instructions are followed. I was equally glad that my order arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia  A. Sholtis

customer_reviews.title: Smells like it but I’m not too confident.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased a lot of essential oils. I Always buy organic. I thought I’d try a new brand and saw the price and said why not give it a try. I normally buy ancient nutrition however they are pricey however their products are high quality. I found this frankincense oil from zongle to be weak especially when diffusing. I know the price is tempting compared to other brands but I’d keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very good oil for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have used several different Frankincense products and I feel this one is excellent in value. It smells good but does smell a little different than other brands I have used. I use it mostly to rub on my feet at bedtime and it seems to help as much as some other Frankincense oils I have used. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P. Harris

customer_reviews.title: This oil is organic and ingestable.  Good for people and pets. Good for skin.
customer_reviews.text: This oil is very easy to use. A small amount goes far. I wet my hands and put a drop of oil on my palm, then rub palms together and rub as washing face after. I used this oil on insect bites. Esp. Spider bites. My dog had a cut paw that wasn’t healing after antibiotics. It was either too wet inside or very dry. A wet cotton pad with a couple drops of oil rubbed into foot crevices was curative. (Not for open wounds)
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: THE FRANKINCENSE OIL IS GREAT FOR JOIN PAIN
customer_reviews.text: THE FRANKINCENSE OIL IS GREAT FOR JOIN PAIN!! ADD IT TO A CARRIER OIL(OLIVE OIL) AND RUB IT ON THE PAIN....IT WORKS SOOOOO WELL! I'M VERY PLEASED WITH THIS AND WILL BUY THIS AGAIN!!!!!! THANK YOU SOOOOO MUCH! THIS IS AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and great Seller!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived as described and I immediately began using it in my diffuser..love the smell. I mixed it with almond oil as a carrier and find it to be quite soothing on my dry skin. I will buy this product again from this Seller. Great service !
customer_reviews.author: whitefoxx59

customer_reviews.title: ... my gut and I think it is doing some good and calming my autoimmune
customer_reviews.text: it feels cooling to my gut and I think it is doing some good and calming my autoimmune disease
customer_reviews.author: P. C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a good oil and it hasn't been diluted like some of the companies are doing to their frankincense oils. The scent is strong and beautiful. Aura Cassia's oils are very high quality and they also have an excellent frankincense oil, but this Zongle frankincense oil is even stronger. Now for the real test. I have an inflammatory skin condition which can exhaust me during the day, and keep me awake all night long, so I have been putting it on my back, and the pain disappears within about 20 minutes and the relief lasts about 6 to 8 hours. I can sleep through the night, and enjoy the day. Zongle...thanks for getting the 'real thing' out to us!
customer_reviews.author: D-J

customer_reviews.title: wonderful oil for general health and pain
customer_reviews.text: Fresh scent, wonderful oil for general health and pain. Works great with other essential oils. I use it on neck and shoulders, works great for tension relieve. I will buy again. Zongle is a brand i truely trust.
customer_reviews.author: Mama12

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality ~
customer_reviews.text: Zongle essential oils are excellent. I tried other companies, however, I always go back to Zongle. I use frankincense for balancing my immune and hormone system. Also, these oils are reasonably priced for such superior quality.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis G.

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a happy Camper. UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: The cap on the bottle was open and I lost 1/3 of the product inside the bubble wrap. I couldn't return it for a new bottle because I needed to use it right away, so I kept it, but I'm not a happy camper. UPDATE: Within minutes Zongle contacted me and told me that they would refund the money for the !/3 spillage. This makes me feel much better, and I will definitely buy from this company again. BTW, the product works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Bottle arrived with 1/4 of the bottle gone. The exterior packaging didn't appear to have been damaged in anyway, ditto the interior plastic packaging, however as soon as the box was opened the scent of frankincense wafted in the air and the bottle label was peeling off. The oil is pleasant and will likely reorder, though if a future bottle has leaked I won't order from this company, again.
customer_reviews.author: libby hollis

customer_reviews.title: It helps with Joint pain
customer_reviews.text: I have Lupus (SLE) and this helps me with when my flares cause me serious joint pain or muscle pain. This is such a great instant relief. It is well worth the price. I recommend this to anyone with joint or muscle problems from RA, fribro, or lupus, or any other disorder or condition that causes chronic joint and muscle pain. It really does provide instant relief. It doesn't take all the pain away but it takes the edge off and I also put it in my diffuser to help relax me as well.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great product. For the cost I'd give it a try.
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a remarkable product. I'm new to essential oils and don't have a lot of experience. I have had a mole on my hand for several years. I've applied this product for about a week and the mole is nearly gone. I also had a sore on my forearm that wouldn't heal. It was there for over a year and I used this product and it is practically gone.
customer_reviews.author: Vic S.

customer_reviews.title: NOT Frankincense  ESSENTIAL OIL
customer_reviews.text: I only use essential oils in my life and have been using Frankincense for decades from various reputable companies. I tried this one and was blown away at how much this is NOT frankincense essential oil. I don't know what results people are getting from use of this item or if its a placebo effect at work because this is something else. The smell is horrid. NO true frankincense smells like chemicals. I don't understand at all those who like it. I would never use something like this on my body, never mind internally, and not even for a diffuser. To me it is pure garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Lady of the Woods

customer_reviews.text: I don't know if frankincense oil does anything so many fans claim it does, so my rating isn't bases on efficacy. I can say that this oil seems of high quality, that I have ingested it multiple times without any digestive or other issue and that it was delivered quickly along with a query from the seller about if I was happy with the product. So if you're looking for organic ingestible frankincense, I think you'll likely be happy with this purchase.

feature_bullets: USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC Frankincense Essential Oil: ETHICALLY PRODUCED using methods that integrate cultural, biological, and mechanical practices that foster cycling of resources, promote ecological balance, and conserve biodiversity. NATURALLY PRODUCED without using pesticides, synthetic fertilizers, sewage sludge, irradiation, or genetic engineering.

SAFE FOR INGESTION: GSMC and Microbial Tested. Bottled in USA. GMO-Free, Preservative-Free, Artificial-Ingredients-Free, Paraben-Free, Pesticide-Free, Gluten-Free, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Edible, Kid-Safe (when diluted)
CERTIFIED PURE THERAPEUTIC GRADE Essential Oil: No Additives, Fillers, Bases or Carriers added. Completely Undiluted.
100% NATURAL: Supports healthy cellular function. Helps relieve stress. Helps to heal skin and age spots

STEAM DISTILLED. For Aromatherapy, Face, Skin Care, Internal, Oral and Topical use. Use in Acne Treatment, Capsules, Cream, Diffuser, Drink, Kit, Lotion, Neuropathy Rub, Roll On, Set, with Lavender, with Jojoba, with Myrrh, Wildcrafted.
